chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Corin Ayellin, p. 36 [4]—Slim woman from Emond's Field. She has a thick gray braid that hangs down as far as her hips. She bakes the best sweets in Emond's Field, possibly in the Two Rivers—Egwene asserts that her own mother's are better, but even her mother admits that Mistress Ayellin's are the best. See also Ayellin, Dav.
